nodes.text: The Black Hammer pirate base was the headquarters of the Black Hammer pirates, on Galantos. Located within the Chirk'pn Wastes, on the edge of the Gar'glum Sea, the base consisted of a number of rusty supply silos and laser batteries. Pirates brought their spoils here after raiding ships bound for the city of Gal'fian'deprisi, and the base also received regular tribute from merchants in the city.
